pr_title: Stop IntelliJ suggesting commonly shaded packages

timeline.message: Stop IntelliJ suggesting commonly shaded packages

timeline.bodyText: @ilyanep If memory serves you had a list of packages that are helpful to exclude, is there anything missing here?
timeline.author: carterkozak

replies.bodyText:
@carterkozak My full list is:

com.palantir.shaded
com.sun.javafx.collections
com.sun.tools.javac.util
com.sun.xml.internal
de.intarsys
io.vavr
jersey.repackaged
org.apache.poi.ss.formula
org.aspectj.lang.annotation
org.codehaus.jackson
org.jooq.Exception.IOException
shaded.com.palantir
shaded.es244
shaded.es6x

Copied from what I have configured right now, though not sure how many of those are generally applicable for baseline. Hope that's helpful!
replies.author: ilyanep

timeline.message: Merge branch 'callumr/stop-suggesting-shaded-classes' of github.com:palantir/gradle-baseline into callumr/stop-suggesting-shaded-classes
